text: Geir Karlsen (born in 1965) is a Norwegian business magnate. He is best known as the CFO of Norwegian Air Shuttle, Scandinavia's largest airline,Åpner for kutt i egen lønn (E24 January 08, 2009 Bjørn Haugan, Karoline Flåm, Margrethe Assev) and Europe's third largest low-cost airline. == Biography == Before Norwegian Air Shuttle, Geir Karlsen worked for Golden Ocean Group and Songa Offshore. Then, he held the position Group CFO at London-based Navig8 GroupAksjen stupte da forgjengeren gikk: Nå har Norwegian funnet ny finansdirektør.
